agenda_summary: City staff reviewed the rental assistance extension and ERP upgrade, while public commenters stressed urgency in supporting tenants and landlords.

action_items.description: Publish an FAQ outlining the expanded rental assistance scope for all nine districts.
action_items.support: Speaker 1 noted staff already assist every district but need extra communication.

action_items.description: Coordinate with county supervisors to notify residents of the extended eviction moratorium.
action_items.support: Speaker 0 asked councilmembers to alert constituents about the Sept 28 decision.

action_items.description: Increase staffing for application processing to shorten tenant wait times.
action_items.support: Public comment emphasized the need to expedite and streamline the workload.

decisions.summary: Adopt resolution to execute state rental assistance grant documents and amend Yardi contract.
decisions.support: Speakers described the vote to participate in round two and fund ERP implementation.

decisions.summary: Encourage districts to continue informing residents of Covid-era protections.
decisions.support: Speaker 0 urged council to brief constituents on the extended moratorium.

visuals.caption: Slide showing Q4 Launch Roadmap with staffing and funding checkpoints.
Retro board highlighting Next Steps for application triage teams.
